registry_metadata.description: Field registry for configurable AI SBOM generation and scoring

validation_message.missing: Missing critical field: bomFormat - essential for SBOM identification
validation_message.recommendation: Ensure bomFormat is set to 'CycloneDX'

validation_message.missing: Missing field: datasets - training data information important for transparency
validation_message.recommendation: Add information about the datasets used to train the model

paper.description: Research paper associated with the model

validation_message.missing: No research paper link found
validation_message.recommendation: Add ArXiv tag or paper link to model card

validation_message.missing: No VCS link found
validation_message.recommendation: Add repository link to model card

validation_message.missing: No website link found
validation_message.recommendation: Add website link to model card

validation_message.missing: Missing critical field: specVersion - required for CycloneDX compliance
validation_message.recommendation: Set specVersion to '1.6' for CycloneDX 1.6 compliance

serialNumber.description: Unique identifier for this SBOM instance

validation_message.missing: Missing critical field: serialNumber - unique identifier required
validation_message.recommendation: Generate a UUID for the SBOM instance

validation_message.missing: Missing critical field: version - document version required
validation_message.recommendation: Set version to 1 for initial SBOM generation

primaryPurpose.description: Primary purpose or task of the AI model

validation_message.missing: Missing critical field: primaryPurpose - essential for understanding model intent
validation_message.recommendation: Add the primary task or purpose of the AI model

suppliedBy.description: Organization or individual that supplied the model

validation_message.missing: Missing critical field: suppliedBy - supplier identification required
validation_message.recommendation: Add the organization or individual who provided the model

standardCompliance.description: Standards or regulations the model complies with

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: standardCompliance - compliance information helpful
validation_message.recommendation: Add any relevant standards or regulations the model complies with

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: external_references - additional references helpful
validation_message.recommendation: Add links to papers, documentation, or other resources

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: domain - application domain helpful for context
validation_message.recommendation: Add the domain or field where this model is typically applied

autonomyType.description: Level of autonomy or human involvement required

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: autonomyType - autonomy level information helpful
validation_message.recommendation: Add information about the level of human oversight required

name.description: Name of the AI model component

validation_message.missing: Missing critical field: name - essential for model identification
validation_message.recommendation: Add a descriptive name for the model

validation_message.missing: Missing field: type - component type classification needed
validation_message.recommendation: Set type to 'machine-learning-model' for AI models

validation_message.missing: Missing field: version - component version needed
validation_message.recommendation: Set an appropriate version for the component

validation_message.missing: Missing field: purl - package URL for identification
validation_message.recommendation: Add a Package URL (PURL) for the model

validation_message.missing: Missing field: description - model description helpful for understanding
validation_message.recommendation: Add a clear description of what the model does

validation_message.missing: Missing field: licenses - license information important for compliance
validation_message.recommendation: Add license information for the model

validation_message.missing: Missing field: ethicalConsiderations - ethical information is critical
validation_message.recommendation: Add ethical considerations or fairness assessments

validation_message.missing: Missing field: energyConsumption - energy usage information helpful for sustainability
validation_message.recommendation: Add information about the model's energy consumption

hyperparameter.description: Key hyperparameters of the model architecture

validation_message.missing: Missing field: hyperparameter - training configuration helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add key hyperparameters used during model training

validation_message.missing: Missing field: technicalLimitations - limitations information helpful for safety
validation_message.recommendation: Add known technical limitations of the model

validation_message.missing: Missing field: safetyRiskAssessment - safety assessment important for responsible deployment
validation_message.recommendation: Add safety and risk assessment information

intendedUse.description: Intended use cases for the model

validation_message.missing: Missing field: intendedUse - intended use information helpful for context
validation_message.recommendation: Add intended use cases for the model

typeOfModel.description: Type or architecture of the model

validation_message.missing: Missing field: typeOfModel - model architecture information helpful
validation_message.recommendation: Add the type or architecture of the model (e.g., Transformer, CNN)

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: modelExplainability - explainability information helpful for transparency
validation_message.recommendation: Add information about model explainability or interpretability features

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: energyQuantity - quantitative energy data helpful for sustainability metrics
validation_message.recommendation: Add specific energy consumption quantities

energyUnit.description: Unit of measurement for energy consumption

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: energyUnit - energy measurement unit helpful for standardization
validation_message.recommendation: Add the unit of measurement for energy consumption (e.g., kWh, Joules)

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: informationAboutTraining - training details helpful for understanding model development
validation_message.recommendation: Add information about the training process and methodology

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: informationAboutApplication - application guidance helpful for proper usage
validation_message.recommendation: Add information about intended applications and use cases

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: metric - performance metrics helpful for evaluation
validation_message.recommendation: Add performance metrics and evaluation results

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: metricDecisionThreshold - decision thresholds helpful for operational guidance
validation_message.recommendation: Add decision thresholds for performance metrics

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: modelDataPreprocessing - preprocessing details helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add information about data preprocessing steps

useSensitivePersonalInformation.description: Information about use of sensitive personal data

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: useSensitivePersonalInformation - privacy information important for compliance
validation_message.recommendation: Add information about use of sensitive or personal data

validation_message.missing: Missing field: downloadLocation - model download URL required
validation_message.recommendation: Add a URL where the model can be downloaded

vocab_size.description: Expected size of the model's vocabulary

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: vocab_size - GGUF model properties helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add Vocabulary Size

tokenizer_class.description: The specific tokenizer class or method used

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: tokenizer_class - GGUF model properties helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add Tokenizer Class

context_length.description: Maximum context length or sequence length supported

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: context_length - GGUF model properties helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add Context Length

embedding_length.description: Vector length of the token embeddings

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: embedding_length - GGUF model properties helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add Embedding Length

block_count.description: Number of transformer blocks or layers

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: block_count - GGUF model properties helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add Block Count

attention_head_count.description: Number of attention heads in the model

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: attention_head_count - GGUF model properties helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add Attention Head Count

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: attention_head_count_kv - GGUF model properties helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add Attention Head Count KV

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: feed_forward_length - GGUF model properties helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add Feed Forward Length

rope_dimension_count.description: Number of dimensions for Rotary Position Embedding (RoPE)

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: rope_dimension_count - GGUF model properties helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add RoPE Dimension Count

quantization_version.description: Version or specification identifier of the quantization format

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: quantization_version - GGUF model properties helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add Quantization Version

quantization_file_type.description: Enum or integer identifier for the quantization bit-precision (e.g. Q4_K_M)

validation_message.missing: Missing supplementary field: quantization_file_type - GGUF model properties helpful for reproducibility
validation_message.recommendation: Add Quantization File Type
